alignLabelWithHint.description: Whether to align the label with the hint or not. Defaults to false.

border.description: The border to display around the input. Will render a border by default when border is null.

constraints.description: The constraints to be applied to the input.

contentPadding.description: The padding to be applied to the input.

counterStyle.description: The style use for the counterText.

counterText.description: The text to place below the line as a character counter.

disabledBorder.description: The border to display when the input is disabled and not showing an error.

enabled.description: Whether the input is enabled or disabled.

enabledBorder.description: The border to display when the input is enabled and not showing an error.

errorBorder.description: The border to display when the input has an error and does not have the focus.

errorMaxLines.description: The maximum number of lines the error text can use.

errorStyle.description: The style to use for the error text.

errorText.description: The error text to display when the input has an error.

fillColor.description: The fill color of the input.

filled.description: Whether the input is filled with fillColor.

floatingLabelBehavior.description: Defines how the floating label should be displayed.

floatingLabelStyle.description: The style to use for the floating label.

focusColor.description: The color to use when the input is focused.

focusedBorder.description: The border to display when the input has the focus.

focusedErrorBorder.description: The border to display when the input has the focus and has an error.

helperMaxLines.description: The maximum number of lines the helper text can use.

helperStyle.description: The style to use for the helper text.

hintMaxLines.description: The maximum number of lines the hint text can use.

hintStyle.description: The style to use for the hint text.

hintTextDirection.description: The direction of the hint text.

hoverColor.description: The color to use when the input is hovered.

isCollapsed.description: Whether the decoration is the same size as the input field.

labelStyle.description: The style to use for the label.

labelText.description: The text that describes the input field.

prefixStyle.description: The style to use for the prefixText.

prefixText.description: The text to display before the input.

semanticCounterText.description: The semantic label for the counterText.

suffixStyle.description: The style to use for the suffixText.

suffixText.description: The text to display after the input.
